Package ftb.client

Provides the classes necessary to create a FTB client and classes a client uses to publish and receive events through Fault Tolerant Backplance (FTB).

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
FTB_Callable FTB_Callable is an interface that defines a callback for certain events.
 

Class Summary
FTB_Client_Info Contains information about a FTB client.
FTB_DEF Includes operation status codes.
FTB_Event_Info Denotes an event that the client wishes to publish.
FTB_Event_Property Used to send payload data with an event.
FTB_Receive_Event Represents an incomming event received by a client.
FTB_Subscription Represents an event subscription by a client.
FTB_World Portal class to Fault Tolerant Backplance (FTB).
 

Exception Summary
FTB_Exception Contains the error code of an operation failure.
 

Package ftb.client Description

Provides the classes necessary to create a FTB client and classes a client uses to publish and receive events through Fault Tolerant Backplance (FTB).

See Also:
ftb.client
